--- select_singer_with_single_column_subquery_with_at.sql
SELECT (
  SELECT FirstName
  FROM Singers LIMIT 100
) AS FN

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.ScalarSubQuery{
          Lparen: 7,
          Rparen: 53,
          Query:  &ast.Query{
            Query: &ast.Select{
              Select:  11,
              Results: []ast.SelectItem{
                &ast.ExprSelectItem{
                  Expr: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 18,
                    NameEnd: 27,
                    Name:    "FirstName",
                  },
                },
              },
              From: &ast.From{
                From:   30,
                Source: &ast.TableName{
                  Table: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 35,
                    NameEnd: 42,
                    Name:    "Singers",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            Limit: &ast.Limit{
              Limit: 43,
              Count: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 49,
                ValueEnd: 52,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "100",
              },
            },
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    55,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 58,
            NameEnd: 60,
            Name:    "FN",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (SELECT FirstName FROM Singers LIMIT 100) AS FN
